Platform

Module: OneScreen

module OneScreen

class PLATFORM

  get "/mine" do

    output = Account.active.find(current_account.id)
    output
  end

INPUTS

Parameters
firstparamdescription 1
2ndparamdescription 2 can be something like oh this parameter works this way

EXAMPLE REQUEST

 return get('api.dev.onescreen.net/v2/accounts/mine')
